item.title: WordPress Docker Development Set-Up with Traefik, Redis, and Nginx
item.description: Hey there, today I am going to walk you through setting up a WordPress Development using Docker, Traefik, Redis and Nginx.

item.title: Advanced WordPress Development Environment with Docker, Traefik, and Redis
item.description: Hey there, today I’m going to walk you through how to setup an advanced WordPress development environment, using Docker, Traefik, and Redis.
